content: 9 times needle one starts and ends with k1 while needle 2 starts and ends with a a purl round 2 c1r3 p1 ktbl p1 9 times round 3 k4 p1 sl1 p1 9 times round 4 k4 p1 ktbl p1 9 times round 5 k4 p1 sl1 p1 9 times round 6 k4 p1 ktbl p1 9 times heel flap you will be working over needle 2 only 31 sts work in flat knitting back and forth in row row 1 ws sl1 ptbl k1 p4 k1 4 times ptbl sl1 row 2 rs k1 ktbl p1 k4 p1 4 times ktbl k1 repeat these 2 row until heel flap is 2 75 in or up to desired length heel turn row 1 ws sl1 p16 p2tog p1 turn row 2 rs sl1 k4 ssk k1 turn row 3 ws sl1 p to 1st before gap p2tog p1 turn row 4 rs sl1 k to 1st before the gap ssk k1 turn repeat row 3 and 4 until all the sts are worked on the last 2 row omit the last p1 and k1 stitch gusset with needle 2 pu and k a st for each slipped stitch along the edge pickup 2 additionnal sts o each side of the gap between instep and gusset and purl those 2 sts together to avoid gusset hole on instep needle 1 continue knitting in established pattern row 4 on sole needle 2 pickup 2 additionnal sts o each side of the gap between instep and gusset and purl those 2 sts together to avoid gusset hole and then pu and k a st for each slipped stitch along the edge knit to last 3 sts k2tog p1 round 1 instep needle 1 continue in established pattern sole needle 2 p1 ssk knit to last stitch p1 round 2 instep needle 1 continue in established pattern sole needle 2 p1 knit to last 3 stiches k2tog p1 papillotes by rosehiver 3 pppaaapppiiillllllooottteeesss sssoooccckkk repeat these 2 rnds until you have the same amount of sts on both the front and the back needle 32 sts per needle foot continue knitting instep sts in established pattern and on sole purl the first and last stitch and knitting the middle sts until foot length is approx 2 5 in shorter than overall desired sock length ending if possible after row 2 of pattern stitch toe knit all sts on both needle for 6 rnds decreasing for toes round 1 instep needle k1 ssk knit to last 3 sts k2tog k1 sole needle k1 ssk knit to last 3 sts k2tog k1 round 2 knit on both needles with no decreasing repeat these 2 rnds until 16 sts remain 8 sts per needle graft toe using kitchener stitch papillotes by rosehiver 4
